net.neoforged.neoforge.event.entity.living.LivingConversionEvent.Pre
所有已实现的接口:
net.neoforged.bus.api.ICancellableEvent
封闭类:
LivingConversionEvent
public static class LivingConversionEvent.Pre extends LivingConversionEvent implements net.neoforged.bus.api.ICancellableEvent
LivingConversionEvent.Pre is triggered when an entity is trying to replace itself with another entity This event may trigger every tick even if it was cancelled last tick for entities like Zombies and Hoglins. To prevent it, the conversion timer needs to be changed or reset This event is ICancellableEvent If cancelled, the replacement will not occur

    • setConversionTimer

      public void setConversionTimer(int ticks)
      Sets the conversion timer, by changing this it prevents the event being triggered every tick Do note the timer of some of the entities are increments, but some of them are decrements Not every conversion is applicable for this
      参数:
      ticks - timer ticks
